sentence: Rep. Debbie Lesko, an Arizona Republican, said her state has been on standard time for nearly 40 years.
author: Ariana Figueroa
title: Congress hates changing the clocks just like everyone else

sentence: “This bill puts partisan political priorities ahead of women in need,” said Rep. Debbie Lesko, Arizona Republican and a domestic violence survivor.
author: Susan Ferrechio
title: Women’s anti-violence law keeps transgender access provision

sentence: Rep. Debbie Lesko, a member of the House Energy and Commerce Committee, has some answers on today’s edition of “The Daily Signal Podcast.” Lesko, R-Ariz., pledges that if the GOP regains the majority in Congress, lawmakers will act swiftly to reduce gas prices and increase America’s energy independence.
author: Douglas Blair
title: Rep. Debbie Lesko Reveals GOP Plan to Lower Gas Prices
